title: KutsuDaru.
synopsis: In a Tokyo suburb small town, there lives a girl named Nekota Kaoru. Being born into a normal family, being raised in a normal way, this spring she'll become a normal happy middle-schooler.
characters: ['Darudaru Kutsushita', 'Tachibana, Kurara', 'Karasawa, Rin', 'Maruo, Mikako', 'Nekota, Kaoru', 'Narrator', 'Morishita, Daniel']
voices: ['Hikida, Yukari', 'Shima, Yuika', 'Satou, Hinata', 'Kanai, Miki', 'Horiuchi, Marina', 'Inada, Tetsu', 'Suganuma, Hisayoshi']
